roleset.name: need
roleset.note: RELY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rely' based on sentences in financial subcorpus.Verbnet entry rely-70, no Framenet entry. Comparison to need. (from rely.01-v predicate notes)
RELIANT-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from reliant.01-j)

example.name: rely-v: prepositional arg2
example.text: Michael, which also processes potatoes, still relies onspuds for about a fourth of its sales and nearly half its pretaxprofit.
example.arg: for about a fourth of its sales and nearly half its pretax profit

example.name: rely-v: sentential arg2
example.text: Still, Unisys said its European business was weak during thequarter, a worrisome sign given that the company has relied on solidresults overseas to overcome weakness in the U.S. over the pastseveral quarters.
example.arg: to overcome weakness in the U.S.

example.name: reliance-n
example.text: A handful of states have slowly started to shift their reliance on various taxes in recent years.

roleset.name: able to be counted on
roleset.note: RELIABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5. (from reliable.01-j)

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: The BILAG2004-Pregnancy index is reliable for assessment of disease activity in pregnant SLE patients.
example.arg: for assessment of disease activity in pregnant SLE patients
